setting.name: Extract FIG Markers From Working Text
setting.description: Extract any \fig markers that are in the text which is being imported as working text.

setting.name: Extract FE Markers From Working Text
setting.description: Extract any \fe markers that are in the text which is being imported as working text.

setting.name: Current Component
setting.description: The current (perhaps more accurately the previously processed) component.

setting.name: Component Renderer
setting.description: The render for this kind of component. The value must correspond with a Rapuma method written for this specific renderer.

setting.name: Source Editor
setting.description: The editor the source text comes from. Paratext is the assumed default. Changing this might disrupt some functions.

setting.name: Macro Package
setting.description: The macro package the XeTeX rendering engine will use to render components.

setting.name: Font Name
setting.description: The font use to render components for this type. Use only the Rapuma recognized name for this font.
